#1 zarqa
lives in.. the underside of cliffs, branches, and hanging objects in cold, dry areas with not that much wind
eats... light that bounces off the floor
discovered by demo
a paper thin and almost transparent flower that surrounds itself with a faint black haze. the black haze emanates from the flowers underside, making it difficult to spot. if you do see it, don't look for too long. it will make you feel *funny.* they're constantly shifting subtly in color and shape.
#2 hander
lives in.. forest area
eats... dust particles
discovered by valendar
they exist everywhere but like to spend time in forest areas for fun. you can only see them in you take a special medicine cus they only exist in the hander dimension.
#3 worm-girl
lives in.. crevices
eats... smaller bugs
discovered by kyu
mix of caterpillar and shrimp. they live both on land and in water. they have pointy feelers and shiny round tails. known for being escape artists.
#4 winj
lives in.. wet caves
eats... algae and slimes
discovered by ribose
they live mostly underground, making their nests at the edges of subterranean lakes and rivers. if the weather is just right (cool, misty, not too much moonlight), winj can sometimes be spotted on the surface.
#5 lonliest corona
lives in.. right now a kind library
eats... bacteria and air floaters
discovered by morti∞
Usually super microscopic, all impossible to see, but this germ grew to the size of a grapefruit.It's just a simple cold, maybe a runny nose for a week, but due to its size, it can no longer infect anyone. No germ has ever gotten this big before, too big to see any of its friends anymore. No germ has also ever gotten this lonely before.
#6 mete bunny
lives in.. grass, forests, etc. love sweet smelling flowers
eats... carnivorous, usually smaller predators or chunks from larger fauna
discovered by mala
their fur is always wet and resembles raw meat. they smell like normal rabbits which attracts prey and those who find them cute. they roll over like dogs in hope you’ll rub their tummy then chomp at your limbs.
#7 eye deer
lives in.. deepest parts of forests
eats... rare plants and berries
discovered by sunny
They can walk on either two legs or four and are blessed with excellent sight that allows them to detect beings invisible to the naked eye. However, this also makes them extremely nervous and skittish creatures. It is said that if one trusts you enough, you will be granted endless inspiration.
#8 the trill
lives in.. bushlands
eats... termites
discovered by tawuni
a creature wrought with ambient stress, yet it moves in a terrifyingly deliberate manner under threat. its vocalizations are frequent,however fall outside of most ranges of hearing. likes to watch other creatures from far away, but do not approach.
#9 circui
lives in.. the collective unconscious
eats... thoughts, dreams, wishes, memories
discovered by evie
have you ever woken up perplexed by a dream you can't quite recall? or perhaps you experienced an unsettling sense of familiarity with something you've never encountered before? you may have crossed paths with a circui (plural: circuie). these enigmatic creatures wander through our mindscapes,often affecting our memory and psyche. once believed to be figments of collective hallucination, advancements in dream visualization technology have now allowed us to identify these hungry little culprits.
#10 VESSEL952
lives in.. n/a
eats... nutrients, so far
discovered by VESSEL3
this is a vessel currently in its final stages of development.it has so far shown to be docile and obedient, which is common for vessels with a beating heart. judging from its spiral eye, it will be confused and slow to adapting to the world once finished developing.
#11 loosey
lives in.. shores, radio stations
eats... music, piezoelectric crystals
discovered by mimill
They communicate with others of their species via telecommunication signals sent by the tiny cities on their backs. If u have a radio u can listen to their conversations they have soft hearts and are good at hiding
